com.skobbler.ngx.trail

Class SKTrailSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skobbler.ngx.trail.SKTrailSettings

  • public class SKTrailSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used for styling trails.
    Version:
    3.0.2

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SKTrailSettings()
      Trail type object empty constructor
      SKTrailSettings(boolean dotted, float[] color, int size)
      Trail type object constructor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float[] getColor()
      Gets the color used for rendering the trail
      int getSize()
      Gets the size of the trail.
      int getSmoothLevel()
      Returns the smoothness level for the trail (removing the rough edges, 0 - no smooth, 10 - max smooth)
      boolean isDotted()
      Returns whether the trail will be displayed as dots
      boolean isPedestrianTrailEnabled()
      Returns wheter the trail is a pedestrian trail
      void setColor(float[] color)
      Sets the color used for rendering the trail
      void setDotted(boolean dotted)
      Sets whether the trail will be displayed as dots
      void setPedestrianTrailEnabled(boolean enable, int smoothLevel)
      sets the trail type to pedestrian, and sets the smoothLevel for the trail
      void setSize(int size)
      Sets the size of the trail.
      java.lang.String toString()

    • Constructor Detail

      • SKTrailSettings

        public SKTrailSettings(boolean dotted,
               float[] color,
               int size)
        Trail type object constructor
        Parameters:
        dotted - specifies if the trail should be rendered as dots
        color - color used for rendering the trail
        size - size of the trail. Must be in (1-10) interval.

      • SKTrailSettings

        public SKTrailSettings()
        Trail type object empty constructor

        Returns whether the trail will be displayed as dots

        true if trail is displayed as dots

        the size of the trail.

      • setSize

        public void setSize(int size)
        Sets the size of the trail.
        Parameters:

      • setPedestrianTrailEnabled

        public void setPedestrianTrailEnabled(boolean enable,
                             int smoothLevel)
        sets the trail type to pedestrian, and sets the smoothLevel for the trail
        Parameters:
        enable - true to enable pedestrian trail
        smoothLevel - the smoothness (removing the rough edges, 0 - no smooth, 10 - max smooth) of the trail

      • getSmoothLevel

        public int getSmoothLevel()
        Returns the smoothness level for the trail (removing the rough edges, 0 - no smooth, 10 - max smooth)
        Returns:
        the smoothness level for the trail

      • isPedestrianTrailEnabled

        public boolean isPedestrianTrailEnabled()
        Returns wheter the trail is a pedestrian trail
        Returns:
        true if its a pedestrian trail
